item.title: 2026 College Football Transfer Portal Tracker: Billy Edwards Choses UNC
item.description: The college football transfer portal doesn't technically open until Jan. 2, but players are announcing their intentions to enter the portal.

item.title: NFL Teams Reportedly Interested in Colts QB Philip Rivers as Head Coach
item.description: Multiple NFL teams are reportedly interested in interviewing Colts QB Philip Rivers to be their next head coach.

item.title: Braden Smith on his RECORD BREAKING Primetime Performance in No. 5 Purdue's Win Over Wisconsin
item.description: Purdue Boilermakers' Braden Smith broke the Big Ten all-time assists record in a tough win over the Wisconsin Badgers.
